src:
Ketika Reece James Dianggap Mirip Dengan David Beckham
06 Nov 2019, 17:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Eks gelandang Chelsea Joe Cole menyebut skill umpan crossing milik Reece James setara dengan skill yang dimiliki oleh legenda Manchester United David Beckham.
James adalah pemain didikan akademi Chelsea. Usianya masih 19 tahun saja.
Pemain yang berposisi sebagai bek kanan tersebut dimainkan oleh Frank Lampard di babak kedua saat Chelsea bersua Ajax Amsterdam di matchday 4 Liga Champions.
Keputusan Lampard memasukkan James terbukti jitu. Ia tak cuma menambah gencar serangan The Blues namun ia juga ikut menyumbangkan satu gol yang membuat Chelsea bisa menyamakan kedudukan menjadi sama kuat 4-4.
Laga pun berakhir imbang 4-4. Padahal Ajax sebelumnya sempat unggul 1-4.
text:
When Reece James Is Considered Similar to David Beckham
Nov 6 2019, 17:29 by Bola.net
Former Chelsea midfielder Joe Cole calls Reece James's crossing skill equivalent to the skill possessed by Manchester United legend David Beckham.
James is a student at the Chelsea academy. He was only 19 years old.
The player who plays as a right back was played by Frank Lampard in the second round when Chelsea met Ajax Amsterdam on Matchday 4 of the Champions League.
Lampard's decision to include James proved effective. He not only added to the onslaught of the Blues attack but he also contributed one goal that makes Chelsea can be equal to be as strong as 4-4.
The match ended in a 4-4 draw. Though Ajax had previously superior 1-4.
